mapper.select: SELECT B.RN, B.BIDX, B.MID, B.BTITLE, B.BCONTENT, B.BPOSTDATE, B.BHIT, B.BFILENAME1, B.BFILENAME2, B.BFILENAME3 FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT BIDX, MID, BTITLE, BCONTENT, BPOSTDATE, BHIT, BFILENAME1, BFILENAME2, BFILENAME3 FROM BOARD ORDER BY BHIT DESC) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
